snippet.title: Nea Edem - Reveal Footage
snippet.description:
It's been a while, hasn't it? We're excited to present our newest project, Nea Edem. This is our first ever 3D game, in which players are tasked with exploring the flooded ruins of a post-apocalyptic city, collecting energy cores and upgrades that will allow the robotic protagonist to push further and higher into the ruins.

We intend to have a demo for Nea Edem released as part of the 2021 Sonic Amateur Games Expo this August, so look forward to it!
